value:
$WmMPID_セーラ,ch03_04_Serra_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Ah, we've been expecting you.
You're the ones from another realm
Lord Eliwood warned us about.$k$pI don't know what all the fuss is
about. You don't look very
impressive.$k$pNot compared to a renowned lady
like me—or my vassals. Now,
we will show you your place!$k$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_セーラ,ch03_04_Serra_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Yowch! What's the big idea,
attacking little old me?
You nasty brutes!$k$pI'm going to be gracious and
bow out. But I'm telling you,
Lord Eliwood won't be as nice!$k$Sbs150|
